_header: I shall you tell a great marvel / How an angel for our avail
_description: A song of the Annunciation — six 3-line stanzas (aaa) and burden: ̴What hard ye not the kyng of Jherusalem / Is now bor in Bethelem’

OxfBal354.First Lines:
I shall you tell a gret mervayllHow an angell for owr
                    avayll…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Þat we haue hard þis good tydyngTo þat child
                        Te Deum syngeTe Deum laudamusExplicit
